products.title: BREAKFAST COMBO -  Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix | Multi Millet Upma Mix | Millet Rava Idli Instant Mix (Total 1200g - each 400g)
products.description_html:
Millex Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix

Feeding your family with multi millets dosa will add loads of love to your family. Remember it is the powerhouse of nutrition since it offers a healthier alternative to the traditional dosa recipe. Here are the benefits of eating multi millets dosa as part of your breakfast every day:

  • Packed with rich nutrients
  • Contains high fiber
  • Naturally gluten-free
  • Regulates blood sugar levels

Our Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix gives you a hassle-free way to feed your family the most delicious and nutritious dosa at home. As the name suggests Multi Millets Instant Dosa Mix is made from a blend of different millets like: foxtail millet, finger millet (ragi), pearl millet, sorghum and more. Consuming our multi millets dosa will energize you with plenty of amazing health benefits since millets form the main ingredient.

Order your pack of Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix now!

Millex Multi Millets Upma Mix

Millet is a great source of protein, fiber, essential vitamins, and minerals. Including millets as part of your daily diet will:

  • Keep cardiovascular health in check.
  • Prevent onset of diabetes.
  • Maintain a healthy weight.
  • Ragi boosts immunity, skin and hair health.
  • Manage inflammation in the gut.

Moreover, eating multi-millets upma gives you a healthy amount of protein, which helps to preserve muscle mass and improves body metabolism. The Multi Millets Upma Mis is wonderful choice to feed your family with a scrumptious breakfast. You can be at your creative best by adding peas, lentils, nuts, broccoli and baby corn to give your upma a heavenly taste!

Order your pack of Multi Millets Upma Mix now!

products.description_html:
Millex Millet Health Drink Mix is a wholesome and traditional blend of 30 natural ingredients, carefully curated to provide optimal nutrition and health benefits. This unique mix includes a combination of millets, cereals, pulses, dry fruits, nuts, seeds, and spices, making it a powerhouse of essential nutrients. Enriched with 18 vital Ayurvedic herbs such as Ashwagandha, Shatavari, Gokshura, Jeshtamadhu, and Hippali, this health mix is designed to boost overall well-being and vitality.

Key Benefits:

Nutrient-Rich: Packed with fiber, minerals, vitamins, proteins, and antioxidants to support a healthy lifestyle.

Energy Booster: Provides a balanced mix of proteins, carbohydrates, and healthy fats to fuel your day.

Weight Management: Low in calories and high in fiber, it helps in maintaining a healthy weight by promoting satiety and reducing unnecessary cravings.

Sugar Control: With a low glycemic index, it aids in regulating blood sugar levels, making it an excellent choice for those managing diabetes or insulin sensitivity.

Immunity Support: Helps in the natural production of vitamins and minerals, strengthening your body's defense system.

Digestive Health: High in fiber, it promotes a healthy digestive system for the entire family.

Ayurvedic Power: Enhanced with the proprietary â€˜Arogyamrutha Churnaâ€™ formula, a blend of Ayurvedic herbs that offer additional health benefits and immunity to combat viral infections.

Why Choose Millex Millet Health Drink Mix?

100% natural with no artificial flavors, additives, or colors.

A perfect blend of traditional wisdom and modern nutrition.

Suitable for all age groups, making it an ideal choice for a healthy family.

Enjoy the goodness of nature in every sip or bite with Millex Millet Health Drink Mix â€“ your daily dose of health and wellness!
